title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details
description:
Bug 9654: Modify Parameters - Dialog details: 
1. Duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. 
2. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB:
1. The marking between the button and the list is too large. 
2. The top button should be aligned with the dialog top. 
3. The table should have a label so it can contain a mnemonic. 
4. Multiple selection should be allowed as the move up/down functionality can be applied to more than one item. 
5. The signature preview must be a label that wraps text. 
6. It would be nice if the signature preview has the background color set to the same color as a hover.
EB:
1. The marking between the button and the list should have a smaller space. 
2. The top button should be aligned with the top of the dialog. 
3. The table should have a label to indicate its purpose and allow for mnemonic usage. 
4. Multiple selection should be allowed as the move up/down functionality can be applied to multiple items. 
5. The signature preview must be a label that wraps text. 
6. The signature preview should have the same background color as a hover.
